name: Generation Chicken
description:
These chickens are stuck in a generational loop. Help them escape!

Each generational loop (level) you play adds a new fun mechanic to the game while simultaneously reinventing the previously familiar map. Do you have what it takes to beat all 4 levels?

FEATURES:
- 5 unique sound tracks to uncover
- 4 complex variations of the same map
- 3 new mechanics to unlock
- manually inserted pixels to create sprites and artwork

CONTROLS:
- A, D (or left and right arrow keys) to Move
- Space to jump
- Left Shift to Dash
